website_summaries.verdict: A reliable pick for those who want a farmhouse look. This light is also Dark Sky approved.
pros: Steel construction with a bronze finish
Available in several sizes and looks
Water resistant and Dark Sky approved (helps to prevent light pollution)
cons: Some buyers feel that this light is small and cheap looking

customer_reviews.title: Nice Light!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this light for over the sink in our laundry room. We previously installed 2 of these in the kitchen at our mountain house. Love it. It's inexpensive and has a great farmhouse style.
customer_reviews.author: PR

customer_reviews.title: Good looking medium sized light
customer_reviews.text: Medium sized light that looks great when installed. Quick shipping and easy installation.
customer_reviews.author: Hnicks

customer_reviews.title: Holding up well after a year, great color and works well with LED bulbs
customer_reviews.text: I installed a couple of these which was quick and easy. The included screws and hardware work fine, nothing fancy. These look like smaller versions of farmhouse lights but different enough they won't be mistaken as replicas, they have their own simple design. Using two as patio lights and another at each door (front and side) as entry lights. I use Phillips soft-white LED bulbs equal to 60 watt incandescent; they give a warm light and last for thousands of hours even outside. My photos show some dust that collected on top, probably from using a leaf blower in the backyard. It's unnoticible normally. They hide dust pretty well, clean up easily with a damp paper towel.
customer_reviews.author: BoaltGeek

customer_reviews.title: Not RED, more of a BURGUNDY - but very attractive lamp!
customer_reviews.text: Great light, looks very nice. As others have said, it's not "red" - it's burgundy. And reading that is what made me buy it; the building I bought it for has burgundy trim, and it isn't a perfect match but it looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Mark G.

customer_reviews.title: Charming!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty standard (good) construction. Easy to wire. I purchased three to use in a camp-themed prop as they look to be about 2/3 scale barn lights. I modified mine slightly with a coat of green paint and easy removal of the wall plate.
customer_reviews.author: David Andora

customer_reviews.title: Love this light!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to install. I hung this light above my kitchen sink to replace a small fluorescent light, and it is plenty bright enough for over the sink. I love the farmhouse look it adds. I think I'm going to order another for my shed outside.
customer_reviews.author: CR91

customer_reviews.title: I love these and I have 3 of them on the ...
customer_reviews.text: I love these and I have 3 of them on the outside of our garage. I don't know if its the smaller size of them, or the wattage of the lights.... they are pretty and give off an attractive glow, but they really don't provide much lighting.
customer_reviews.author: Saka

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: We installed this light inside our house. It projects much more light than expected. Very happy with it! We live in a cabin that is very dark due to all of the wood walls/ceiling/floors. We are going to order another one because of how good it looks and how much light it projects !
customer_reviews.author: KeeKop

customer_reviews.title: Attractive well packaged light fixtures
customer_reviews.text: I got three of these to light up a small entryway/now converted to home office. Could no longer get to the ceiling to install a light so I went from below up inside a wall to install these attractive lights. They were packaged well, all parts neatly attached to each fixture. Very well done! I installed 100-watt equivalent LEDs (15 watts, 1600 lumens) in my fixtures. Lots of light! They do not shine light upward (I knew that) and give a nice glow to the wall and room area below. Package says these fixtures are for outdoor use; they seem a little lightweight to me to use outdoors. So someone else will have to give that review.
customer_reviews.author: Farmtown

customer_reviews.title: Love this Light!
customer_reviews.text: Love this light my husband and I used it to make my son a headboard for his bed for homework studying and late night reading.
customer_reviews.author: Lyska White

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and great value!
customer_reviews.text: We really love this little mirror! I put and Edison bulb in and it makes it so charming and farmhouse-y. It is more of a satin black finish - not matte but not so shiny that I would have to return it (since the look I was going for was matte). It was a very simple install and is just the perfect size! I can’t believe the value and quality for the price. Very pleased and it saved me over $100 going this route as opposed to my original choice from Wayfair. (Ignore our patchwork/painting we have to do from our old lighting)
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Gives a classy look to the front porch
customer_reviews.text: It looks great, a tad smaller than I expected. After installing this we have gotten a lot of positive comments, which is surprising because most people go by our house at around 40plus miles per hour. I put a motion sensor light inside this and it works great for a front porch motion light. included is the link for the led light bulb I used:
customer_reviews.author: EMarco

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute, Cozy and Superb Quality!
customer_reviews.text: I ABSOLUTELY LOVE this light, it super cute and quality is superb! I used it in my bathroom and used a puck light inside as I don’t have existing electric to that wall. It works perfectly and you use it either way and for any room in your house! I will be purchasing more for other rooms in my house!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, but jury is still out.
customer_reviews.text: I was very nervous to purchase this light because other people had said it didn’t seem like it would be usable for outdoors. A friend of mine put it up for me and he said he thinks it’s going to be fine. It’s adorable and exactly what I want. I’m not sure how it will really hold up in my Wisconsin winter. But it’s beautiful. He said he just needed to seal it. It’s very light weight, which makes me a little nervous. We’ll see.
customer_reviews.author: MEG

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful clean lines, modern and also classic, lots of light!
customer_reviews.text: I am really happy with this light fixture. It is a great size, not small, but not huge either, like Costco-size outdoor fixtures. I was surprised that it disperses more light than our previous fixture, which had glass windows on all side - nice and bright! It is basically black in color, with some rustic rubbed oil edges, looks very classic but also simultaneously modern. Really good-looking fixture, and unique. Only ones in our neighborhood with one like it!
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We bought 2 of these for use in our master bedroom next to our bed. I didn't realize until we were ready to install them that they are intended for use outdoors. However, they look GREAT! I am so happy I didn't thoroughly read the description saying they were intended for use outdoors as I likely would not have bought them. They are PERFECT for our bedroom!
customer_reviews.author: SMWG

customer_reviews.title: Not really bronze, but still attractive
customer_reviews.text: I would not call the product I received "bronze" and it doesn't at all have the same color as the photo. The inside is stark white where I was expecting off-white, and the exterior is all but black, and the "brushed" quality is basically polished bright coppery metal showing on some of the edges. It still looks great, it installed with relative ease (my house is a little off so there was some extra work but that shouldn't be the norm) and I love that it's super easy to keep clean. I put it in my kitchen and it has a wonderful farm-house meets industrial style.
customer_reviews.author: Tori

customer_reviews.title: Farmhouse beautiful
customer_reviews.text: We bought both an 8inch and 10inch. They are super easy to install. We bought antique edison bulbs from Walmart at $8 a piece, they are LED. I highly recommend them, they give a perfect amber color. The only difference I see other than size is that the bulb doesn't protrude as much from the 10 inch as it does from the 8 inch, but it is still lovely. The first two pics are the 8inch and the second 2 pics are the 10inch.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Good light that fulfilled our space requirements.
customer_reviews.text: I like the style of this light and it replaced a light above our medicine cabinet which had a confined space. There are two things I do not like, the first is that this is not red at all but a dark rusty burgundy color. The second is because of the way the shade is shaped light does not spread well around the room. So even though it has the same watt lightbulb is gives off less usable light. Neither one of these issues bugs me enough to take it down and return it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Grame

customer_reviews.title: These lights are adorable and look great around the outside of the house
customer_reviews.text: These lights are adorable and look great around the outside of the house. We even put one in our small bathroom with an Edison bulb. Outside we are using dusk to dawn bulbs in them and they work perfectly. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Different, but cool
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was cool to have outside on my porch. It's different so no one has one but me. Only thing is, without it having a glass covering on the bottom, it sure is bright. I put in a 25wt bulb and it was still real bright. So, I have a 15wt bulb in and it works fine. I can also put in a colored bulb. I like it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: XERCIZER

customer_reviews.title: Great light
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and in perfect condition. The light is very well constructed and added a slightly farm like atmosphere to our back patio area. We live in a Home Owners Association community where our yards are somewhat close together. But this light streams the light just to our patio area without encroaching on out neighbor's back yards. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Francis

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the purchase. I rent a house and the old light fixture on the front porch was really old and rusty, so I wanted to replace it without spending a ton of money. This added a nice little decorative note, matches my cute black shutters, and provides a perfect amount of light. My boyfriend got it put up in under five minutes. May get one for the back porch as well.
customer_reviews.author: SCbelle20

customer_reviews.title: MUST BUY!
customer_reviews.text: We did not use with wiring for electric. I plan to put the light pucks in them that are sitting on the headboard. So gorgeous and incredible price. I’m fact, I am going to buy more to decorate throughout the house! Large and expensive looking! Hit this one out of the ballpark.
customer_reviews.author: Bekah

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Have had installed for about 1-2 months now without issue and works great. It does not fit tightly to the brick (not sure any would), so I did use clear caulk to seal between the brick and base of the light (leaving an unsealed place at the bottom) to prevent rain from entering.
customer_reviews.author: LAllen

customer_reviews.title: Barn lighting not just for outside
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect size and lighting for above my kitchen sink! Yes, inside. It looks great and illuminates so much better than what I had. I needed a white one, so I spray painted this one and looks awesome. Nice quality, fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Jett

customer_reviews.title: Very nice wall lamp
customer_reviews.text: This outdoor lamp is very elegant looking. It was very easy to install and just looks nice. I installed it on our outdoor garden shed and it gives it a touch of class. The shed has an overhang so it should be ok from the elements.
customer_reviews.author: Young Jedi

customer_reviews.title: Good size for over the kitchen sink
customer_reviews.text: Nice downlight for inside or outside. Not too big, but has a pretty long gooseneck. We use a silver dipped bulb to keep the light from shining in our eyes.
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Cute and great price!
customer_reviews.text: Love this little light! I’ve purchased several at this point. Inexpensive and adorable. Perfect amount of light. I’ve only ever used these on porch areas where it does not get directly rained on so I can’t speak to durability in the rain.
customer_reviews.author: SweetHomeNola

customer_reviews.title: Nice lights, packaged well.
customer_reviews.text: These are nice lights, exactly as described. I installed in place the house originals (25 yrs old), and installation was pretty easy. I installed 5 of these and had no issues. Nicely packaged, and they all arrived in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Market

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality - will rust in short time if used outside.
customer_reviews.text: We like the appearance, but only after a short time it is already rusting. This was installed as part of a new petite wedding venue and will have to be replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Peabody

customer_reviews.title: Farmhouse perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I have these as lighting choice over the couch in my farmhouse styled home office. They look so nice and were a fraction of the price of others I looked at. My husband had NO trouble installing them. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty bronze
customer_reviews.text: The picture online and the color in real life is spot on. The bronze edge is really pretty. I wanted to put these in our office but the arm goes too high above the wire box and would be touching the ceiling. Didn’t hook the light up because our junction box was too high. Great price, wish it would’ve fit my space.
customer_reviews.author: T. L. Reisinger

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Value!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing lights! I ordered the 10" light for above the doorway and the 8" lights for the lighting outside the garage. I have one more light in the back yard that will be replaced with one of these as well! Fantastic value!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Minimalist and great for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: It’s great for our small, extra bathroom. Like that it’s not too much light in this space, but definitely wouldn’t be enough light for a highly-used vanity/mirror bathroom area. Perfect for us!
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Love the light. It’s a great price and looks great. Has that farmhouse look everyone is looking for. Simple to install and has all the pieces you need to install. It’s medium sized so not too big or too small. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Design for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Materials are not heavy quality, but as a porch light, doesn’t matter. I’m not sure if it would fare less well in “weather;” besides having little to speak of in SoCal, our porch does have a roof over it. Love the design, not overwhelmingly large size, and gloss paint finish.
customer_reviews.author: Saladbar

customer_reviews.title: Great light!
customer_reviews.text: Great light fixture. Looks high quality in person and so far works great. Can't beat the price. We actually put it in our bathroom over the mirror and it gives a cool vintage look to the room.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Goldstein

customer_reviews.title: Directs light downward and outward
customer_reviews.text: A few quibbles: the arched neck was a bit skewed to the side on one, and the copper-colored paint highlights were not very sharp on the other. The white interior of the shade is a nice smooth, glossy white.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas A. Kaul

customer_reviews.title: Quality and Versatile
customer_reviews.text: These were a great addition to the lighting effects in the bedroom. Made mostly for outdoor lighting purposes, but installed them on each side of the bed as wall sconces. They were the easiest to install. All mounting hardware was included. They produce the right amount light for reading
customer_reviews.author: Jim T.

customer_reviews.title: Hardware missing
customer_reviews.text: The light itself is beautiful, but the bolt/screw that attaches to the front plate of the light is missing. Therefore we have no way to install it. Manufacturer was unable to be contacted by amazon to resolve.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Lewicki

customer_reviews.title: Simple yet very cool looking light fixture
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy with my new porch light and so happy that I don't have to contend with a porch light with glass!! It's perfect for my cottage style home and reminds me of the kind of lamp you would see on a boat dock or pier. It also took no time at all times install. Very easy to replace my old porch lamp with broken the glass.
customer_reviews.author: Arturo Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and well priced
customer_reviews.text: Excellent price point compared to similar style fixtures. It arrived well packaged and looks exactly like the pictures. The cover plate is large, allowing it to fit over different sized wall boxes. I original wanted to purchase this, but first went with 2 other lights that didn’t suit the space after all. Should have just bought this to begin with and saved my time!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, easy to install by yourself, great price point and looks good! Ordered one to test it out and loved it so we ordered 7 more for all of our outdoor lights!
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Gives off a nice glow to our front porch
customer_reviews.text: I was worried that because this was a downlight it wouldn't be bright enough, but that wasn't the case. Gives off a nice glow to our front porch. We liked it so much, we bought another for the garage entrance. Good deal for the price. My husband installed it himself with no problems, said it was very straightforward. Would buy again if we had more outdoor needs
customer_reviews.author: Lydia Thiele

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.text: Love these lights. I added dusk to dawn bulbs and they work and look good. Used larger fixture over stairway and smaller by doors. Only reason I gave 4 stars is that they’re not as sturdy as some I’ve seen but unless they get bumped, they should hold up for years. Great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Well made, functional, and attractive -- and reduces light pollution!
customer_reviews.text: Well made, functional, and attractive. I installed it to minimize stray light pollution for astronomy, and the design is very good for directing light in a downward cone and not wasting light pointed at the sky or far away. I plan to buy another one (or two) as gifts for neighbors, in an effort cut down on he light pollution here. It's not strong enough to hang from it like a monkey, and a direct hit from a basketball would probably hurt it ... so don't hang from it or throw basketballs at it!
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Paonessa

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t cast a very bright light if using an Edison style bulb
customer_reviews.text: Very attractive light fixture, we use it by our back door. I wouldn’t recommend it for a door you need to unlock with keys as it doesn’t cast a bright light, especially if using an Edison style bulb. However it’s ideal as a “dark sky” light, such as beach side, as it won’t disturb nesting animals like turtles.
customer_reviews.author: teacher mom

customer_reviews.title: Nice, needs electrical work though
customer_reviews.text: Looked great and was all put together. But doesn’t come with a wire to plug in. It needs electrical work to be installed. Which I didn’t read before buying So I returned.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: This don’t look very nice in person. The metal looked cheaper than I hoped. Plus it was slightly larger than expected based on the size listed. Was not a good fit for us. No pun intended.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper5

customer_reviews.title: Cute, cute, cute!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of these for my business. Two on the deck and one on the patio. They are a smaller size which is just perfect for these spaces. The blue color adds a little bit of style. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Gagliardi

customer_reviews.title: Great light.
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these in my office. They are perfect. Quality is fantastic- better than the ones I looked at at a big box store.
customer_reviews.author: Nanarrow

customer_reviews.title: Great size
customer_reviews.text: We bought 5 of these for exterior lights. I originally ordered a gooseneck from wayfair and then these amazon ones to compare. I thought I’d like the lights from wayfair better and I don’t. Color is perfect and these are a large size. Love them! I left a picture of them in comparison to the gooseneck from wayfair! So happy with the amazon light!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: First one not for me, second one was perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Received the first one and the hardware missing. Had to return it. Ordered another and that one was perfect! Easy to install and love the lighting it provide to the bathroom of my 1920s cottage.
customer_reviews.author: danielle cook

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for us!
customer_reviews.text: These have been so perfect in our home!! It has a little farmhouse look to them. I have these over our three windows in the living room. We did not wire them so I am not sure how easy or hard that wouldve been BUT we hot glued some LED lights to them and have been a nice addition to our living space!
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: Work well
customer_reviews.text: Well made. I bought 4 of them for front yard and liked them so much I bought 4 more. Easy to hang. Sad they’re made in China not USA
customer_reviews.author: Yoni

customer_reviews.title: Simple yet well made
customer_reviews.text: I like this light because of its simplicity and old fashioned look. We had a light with photo cell and motion detector, but after a while the weather gets the best of it. Changed to this light and replaced the switch with a timer, problem solved.
customer_reviews.author: William Aquino

customer_reviews.title: Lower life span than expected
customer_reviews.text: After a year in California temperate weather these look old and shabby. Feel like they need to be replaced Even in covered areas
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 1.5 years
customer_reviews.text: These were installed March 2019. Its September 2020 and these are completely rusted. I’m not sure if I should take them down, sand, repaint or just throw them out.
customer_reviews.author: Fd77

product_meta.title: Design House 519504 Mason 1 Light Wall Light, Oil Rubbed Bronze
product_meta.description: Size:8 in.| Color:Oil-rubbed BronzeThe Design House 519504 Mason 1 Light Wall Light is made of formed steel with an oil rubbed bronze finish and metal shade. This sconce is ideal for mounting above doorways, on back porches and walkways. This light glows like a street lamp and meshes traditional aesthetics with an industry leading design. This item is Dark Sky approved and helps prevent light pollution and bad lighting. This fixture measures 8.375-inches by 11-inches and weighs 1.36-pounds. Use this light to deter burglars and maintain a well-lit porch. It uses a 60-watt medium based incandescent bulb and is UL listed, cUL listed and approved for wet areas. The Design House 519504 Mason 1 Light Wall Light comes with a 10-year limited warranty to the original purchaser to be free from defect in materials and workmanship. Design House offers products in multiple home decor categories including lighting, ceiling fans, hardware and plumbing products. With years of hands-on experience, Design House understands every aspect of the home decor industry, and devotes itself to providing quality products across the home decor spectrum. Providing value to their customers, Design House uses industry leading merchandising solutions and innovative programs. Design House is committed to providing high quality products for your home improvement projects.
feature_bullets: Illuminates decks, driveway, porches, and indoor spaces
Cost effective and deters theft and crime
Uses (1) 60 Watt medium base bulb (not included)
Constructed of formed steel and suitable for damp locations

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars1,150 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
